summary: This bill, the Roberto Clemente Commemorative Coin Act, mandates the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue commemorative coins honoring the life and legacy of baseball player and humanitarian Roberto Clemente. The bill details coin specifications, including denominations ($5 gold, $1 silver, and half-dollar clad coins), design requirements (featuring Clemente and inscriptions), sale procedures, and surcharges. Proceeds from surcharges will go to the Roberto Clemente Foundation for use in their social mission. The bill also includes financial assurances to prevent net costs to the government. The issuance of these coins is planned for 2027.
